title: What are the next big product trends in the world? - Quora

response.answer_text: Improved version of AirPods 2 will rock the market. China has been releasing new version of AirPods clone every week. You can hit my profile to visit my highlights of the products - “AirPods Alternatives”  Soon, the new fake AirPods will be better than the real AirPods and this is the new trending product of 2019. Apple fans gotta love it. Android lovers gotta love it. Everyone will love it.
